block_comment: This block of Verilog RTL code is intended to serve as a configuration switch, specifically for setting up write leveling calibration for a memory system. Depending on two conditions, "WRLVL" being "ON" and "BYPASS_COMPLEX_OCAL" being "FALSE", the block assigns four variables with appropriate signals for calibration. When the conditions are not met, default values are assigned instead, effectively bypassing complex calibration procedures.
